name: Tour  to  Damron
description: Damrong is  a village which is far from the city.. It is completely in the jungle .. It is about  one day walk from my  village ( Lach Village). The special of the trip is to  discover a new environment and checking back your health as you will have to spend a  day of walking . The life is also completely  different  from city life. One of the special  thing is we can learn about the way that  people is living, culture and habits and customs. Come and and experience by your  self.
